tweet: Our office joined volunteers throughout Ventura County to lay down wreaths on the headstones of servicemembers and veterans who have been laid to rest at Conejo Mountain Memorial Park in Camarillo.

#TeamBrownley was honored to take part in Wreaths Across America, an annual event during the holiday season that aims to remember fallen servicemembers and veterans and recognize their sacrifice and service to our nation. pic.twitter.com/2FvA1aUCN4

To honor him, I introduced the Honoring Our Fallen TSA Officers Act -- legislation that would ensure TSA Officers are eligible for the Public Safety Officer Benefits program, which assists the families of our fallen law enforcement officers.

On National #LawEnforcementAppreciationDay, we pay our respects to those who lost their lives in the line of duty, including TSA Officer Gerardo Hernandez, who was tragically killed in 2013. https://juliabrownley.house.gov/brownley-introduces-bill-to-ensure-fair-treatment-for-tsa-officers-killed-in-line-of-duty-in-honor-of-late-lax-tsa-officer-gerardo-hernandez/?fbclid=IwAR2wzPBHbkfI7FwHPimFwJ-3uzt9g9-Gf0uXxHXp7Ljgcn5Nfb6AGRfTzR8 …

That is why I introduced the Reproductive Health Information for Veterans Act, which will ensure that VA provides veterans with comprehensive health care information without exception, including for veterans who request abortion counseling.

VA’s decision to withhold abortion counseling from veterans imposes a discriminatory barrier to veterans’ healthcare & increases out-of-pocket costs for vets, who must seek comprehensive reproductive healthcare services elsewhere at their own expense. https://juliabrownley.house.gov/brownley-introduces-bill-to-ensure-veterans-receive-comprehensive-reproductive-health-care-information/ …

Today, I introduced the Women Veterans TRUST Act, which will ensure that women vets who are suffering from alcohol & drug dependency have access to women-specific drug & alcohol dependency treatment & rehab programs that they deserve. #WomenVetsTaskForce https://juliabrownley.house.gov/brownley-introduces-bill-to-expand-drug-and-alcohol-treatment-programs-for-women-veterans/ …
